body: What's going on in July? Detonator said they don't know what to do with finances after July.
body_tagged: What's going on in July? Detonator said they don't know what to do with finances after July.
title: Help?

replies.body: We don't know, that is something they will have to discuss, not really our business, and I'm sure everything will be fine!
replies.body_tagged: We don't know, that is something they will have to discuss, not really our business, and I'm sure everything will be fine!

replies.body: EULA is going to be changed August the first, just look up 'minecraft eula'.
